thread.title: USC Trojans Put Their Best Foot Forward With New DoctorInsole® Partnership
thread.title_full: USC Trojans Put Their Best Foot Forward With New DoctorInsole® Partnership

author: Lindsey Waterhouse
title: USC Trojans Put Their Best Foot Forward With New DoctorInsole® Partnership
text:
USC has just struck a three year deal with DoctorInsole®, the world’s premier custom-grade OTC orthotic manufacturer, making DoctorInsole an Official Sponsor of USC Athletics. The partnership will provide all Trojan athletes with access to DoctorInsole's line of cutting edge insoles, thus better positioning them for longer endurance, improved balance, and unbridled success, both on and off the field. DoctorInsole’s patent protected products help feet -- and the body-- function in a better, more biomechanically efficient way, allowing for optimal performance in athletics and continued health benefits in everyday life. This forward-thinking partnership supports USC’s vision of embodying ‘today’s champions and tomorrow’s leaders.’
“I’m thrilled to bring this innovative product to the student body at USC,” says DoctorInsole’s co-founder Dr. Robert Joseph. “We’ve developed the first over-the-counter, corrective orthotic insole, which will offer limitless health benefits to the Trojans."
“We are incredibly excited about our new partnership with DoctorInsole and look forward to the positive benefits these inserts can provide to the USC community," says Dan Shell, Vice President and General Manager of USC Sports Properties. "We are thrilled to be their first collegiate partner and welcome them to the Trojan family."
The partnership kicks off October, 2015 and will expand to the entire USC Athletics program through 2018.
DoctorInsoles entire line of products can be seen at http://www.doctorinsole.com
